dcterms:description: The NoXI dataset contains multimodal recordings of mediated novice-expert interactions, which can be used for analyzing facial reactions in dyadic interactions.
dcterms:title: NoXI

dcterms:creator: F. Ringeval
A. Sonderegger
J. Sauer
D. Lalanne
dcterms:description: The RECOLA dataset is a multimodal corpus of remote collaborative and affective interactions, useful for studying emotional responses and interactions in dyadic settings.
dcterms:title: RECOLA

dcterms:creator: C. Palmero
J. Selva
S. Smeureanu
J. Junior
C. Jacques
A. Clapés
A. Moseguí
Z. Zhang
D. Gallardo
G. Guilera
dcterms:description: The UDIVA dataset is designed for context-aware personality inference in dyadic scenarios, providing data for analyzing interactions based on personality traits.
dcterms:title: UDIVA
